Text:
finally i found one that its working! Im w8ing for this for a long time!

Thanks.

Had some small problems getting the right settings for .avi xvid, note for ev1, De-interlacing and High Quality engine don't play nice (and De-interlacing is the only way I got it to make a "non streaking" image....so nix the engine...use de-interlace), it adds a rainbow type band to the bottom.  That having been said extreme kudos to deephole, had a program that ran fine on xp, it had serious trouble on 7...thanks :)
For me it works find on win7... some dvd got protection that cant be overpass but no problemo for me... sorry
